byline.original: By JAMES ALDRIDGE North American Newspaper Alliance

abstract: fighting in southwestern Albanian mts described
snippet: WITH THE GREEK FORCES, in Southwestern Albania, Nov. 30 (Delayed)--The artillery has been keeping up its symphony all night and all day again. There has been no let-up....

headline.main: Greeks Hold Foe in Mountain Trap, But Terrain Makes the Gains Slow; Battle in Southwestern Albania Goes On in Cold, Rain and Mud--Ten Shells and 200 Bullets Needed to Kill a Man There

lead_paragraph: WITH THE GREEK FORCES, in Southwestern Albania, Nov. 30 (Delayed)--The artillery has been keeping up its symphony all night and all day again. There has been no let-up.
